OMNI - The Overseas Moving Network Inter: OMNI - The Overseas Moving Network International
Esta familia internacional, se dedica a: This international family is dedicated to obtaining the excellence in all its activities, committing to provide the best available moving service to its customers, through the closest possible cooperation between its members. OMNI is based on the cooperation principle, by ensuring that local specialists handle all removals of OMNI at origin and destination. Companies operate with the highest possible standards and employ advanced technology to ensure the highest quality in its services.
FIDI - Fédération Internationale des Dém: FIDI - Fédération Internationale des Déménageurs Internationaux
La misión de FIDI es fomentar el avance: FIDI’s mission is to foster progress in terms of quality, integrity and mutual cooperation between affiliated international moving companies. Additionally, it carries out programs of study that help promote competitiveness in the market of removals.
LACMA es la asociación que incluye a 260: LACMA is the association that includes the best 260 moving companies of the world, mainly from Latin America and the Caribbean. Due to their prestige, they generate 90% of imports and exports carried out in Latin America.
La International Association of Movers e: The International Association of Movers is the largest world union of audit, transport, removals and shipping companies.
El Pan American International Movers Ass: The Pan American International Movers Association is a group of international moving companies, representing their mutual interest in interaction with local authorities.
IATA fue fundada en el año 1919. Represe: IATA was founded in 1919. It represents the aviation industry and simplifies travel and cargo processes, by grouping approximately 280 airlines, including the most important ones. The flights of these airlines account for more than 95% of international air traffic, both passenger flights and general cargo.
Es una designación de Calidad, otorgada: It is a designation of quality, granted by FIDI, one of the leading associations of moving companies around the world.
FIDI desarrolló un sistema basado en est: FIDI has developed a quality standards-based system for the international moving industry. This involves all aspects of the company´s activities, working so that the staff can maintain and improve the excellent degree of quality of services provided exclusively for our clients.
Para poder mantener esta prestigiosa cer: In order to maintain this prestigious certification, our company is reaudited every 3 years by the renowned worldwide Ernst & Young, a group of consultants.
Nuestro servicio de origen consiste en e: Our service of origin is to assess, package and transport your belongings from their current location in Venezuela to their final destination, either in a local moving, or a removal at national or international level.
Una vez establecido el contacto con nues: After establishing contact with our executives, a member of our advisors’ team will visit you in your residence and will make recommendations with your removal.
El asesor realizará una evaluación de su: The advisor will carry out an assessment of your assets and will then provide you with a cost estimate, based on your requirements and needs.

Utilizamos material de embalaje de la me: We use the best packaging material to meet international packaging standards.
Haremos seguimiento de sus pertenencias: We will track your belongings during the whole journey of moving, whether local, national or international destination. So we make sure that your most valuable goods remain safe even if the journey to your destination is difficult.
Mudanzas Internacionales Global presta e: Mudanzas Internacionales Global provides the best service in moving your belongings from any country in the world, including the customs process and service with delivery and unpacking at your residence in Venezuela. Our import department will coordinate your move at all stages.

Prestamos servicio a nuestros clientes p: We provide services to our clients for temporary storages.
